line.right: ityuktaṃ bhagavatā , tadā kathaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatītyucyate ? bhagavānāha - so 'pīdānīṃ subhūte puṇyābhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya

line.left: vivardhate ? subhūtirāha - sacedāyuṣman śāriputra divasabhāvanayā vivardhate , evaṃ svapnāntaragatasyāpi vivardhate / tatkasya hetoḥ ?
line.right: hi āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaś ca divasaścokto bhagavatā / sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitālābhī divase

line.left: sarvadharmā uktā bhagavatā , tathā na tasya karmaṇo bhavatyācayo vā upacayo vā / atha punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san

line.left: sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati , </page><page> bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā / kathaṃ ca āyuṣman śāriputra
line.right: hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati ? sacetsvapnāntaragataḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kṛtvā prativibuddhaḥ sannevaṃ vikalpayati - aho hataḥ , sādhu hataḥ , suṣṭhu

line.left: vā / kathaṃ ca āyuṣman śāriputra vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati ? sacetsvapnāntaragataḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kṛtvā prativibuddhaḥ sannevaṃ
line.right: - aho hataḥ , sādhu hataḥ , suṣṭhu hataḥ , mayā hataḥ , ityevaṃ vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati / śāriputra āha - sacedāyuṣman subhūte sa

line.left: prāṇātipātaṃ kṛtvā prativibuddhaḥ sannevaṃ vikalpayati - aho hataḥ , sādhu hataḥ , suṣṭhu hataḥ , mayā hataḥ , ityevaṃ
line.right: hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati / śāriputra āha - sacedāyuṣman subhūte sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati - aho hataḥ

line.left: hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati - aho hataḥ , sādhu hataḥ , suṣṭhu hataḥ , mayā hata iti , bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā ? buddho bhagavān api
line.right: kṣayasaṃjñāmutpādayati / tasyāpi karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā bhavet ? subhūtirāha - no hīdamāyuṣman śāriputra / tatkasya hetoḥ ?

line.left: vikalpayan kṣayasaṃjñāmutpādayati / tasyāpi karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā bhavet ? subhūtirāha - no hīdamāyuṣman śāriputra / tatkasya hetoḥ ?
line.right: hi tathāgataḥ / tadyathāpi nāma ākāśameva āyuṣman śāriputra nānārambaṇaṃ karmotpadyate , nānārambaṇaṃ cittamutpadyate /

line.left: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya naivaṃ bhavati - kasyacidahamāsannaḥ , kasyacidvā dūra iti / tatkasya hetoḥ ?
line.right: ākāśasya / evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarāṃ samyaksabodhirmamāsannā

line.left: naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarāṃ samyaksabodhirmamāsannā , śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti / tatkasya hetoḥ ?
line.right: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati - māyākāro mamāsannaḥ , yaḥ punaranyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ

line.left: nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati - māyākāro mamāsannaḥ , yaḥ punaranyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūra iti / tatkasya hetoḥ ?

line.left: naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā , śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti / tatkasya hetoḥ ?

line.left: pratibhāsa utpadyate tanmamāsanne , ye tu khalu punaratra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūra iti / tatkasya hetoḥ ?

line.left: naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā , śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti / tat kasya hetoḥ ?
line.right: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatasya kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā na saṃvidyate , tatkasya hetoḥ ?

line.right: , evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate / tatkasya hetoḥ ?

line.left: , evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate / tatkasya hetoḥ ?
line.right: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / yathaiva hi bhagavan sarvakalpavikalpaprahīṇastathāgataḥ , tathaiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāpi

line.left: mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate / tatkasya hetoḥ ? avikalpatvādbhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / yathaiva hi bhagavan
line.right: , tathaiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāpi sarvakalpavikalpaprahīṇā / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena yo

line.left: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / yathaiva hi bhagavan sarvakalpavikalpaprahīṇastathāgataḥ , tathaiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāpi
line.right: / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena yo nirmitako nirmitaḥ , na tasyaivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ

line.left: , na tasyaivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre , anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsanneti / tatkasya </page><page> hetoḥ ?
line.right: / evameva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama

line.left: carato naivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre , anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsanneti / tatkasya hetoḥ ?
line.right: bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ , tatkṛtyaṃ karoti / sa ca nirmitako

line.left: bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ , tatkṛtyaṃ karoti / sa ca nirmitako
line.right: / tatkasya hetoḥ ? avikalpatvādeva nirmitasya / evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ

line.left: / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ , tatkṛtyaṃ karoti / sa ca nirmitako 'vikalpaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ ?
line.right: nirmitasya / evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati , tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti , sā ca

line.left: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati , tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti , sā ca prajñāpāramitā
line.right: / tatkasya hetoḥ ? avikalpatvādeva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā

line.left: mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati , tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti , sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā / tatkasya hetoḥ ?
line.right: bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā dārumayī strī vā puruṣo vā

line.left: vā dārumayī strī vā puruṣo vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛto bhavet / sa yasya kṛtyasyārthāya kṛtaḥ , tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti / sa ca dārusaṃghāto
line.right: / tatkasya hetoḥ ? avikalpatvādeva bhagavan dārusaṃghātasya / evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ

line.left: vā puruṣo vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛto bhavet / sa yasya kṛtyasyārthāya kṛtaḥ , tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti / sa ca dārusaṃghāto 'vikalpaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ ?
line.right: bhagavan dārusaṃghātasya / evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati , tacca kṛtyaṃ

line.left: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati , tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti , sā ca prajñāpāramitā
line.right: / tatkasya hetoḥ ? avikalpatvādeva bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā iti // āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ māyopamaparivarto

line.left: mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati , tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti , sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā / tatkasya hetoḥ ?
line.right: bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā iti // āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ māyopamaparivarto nāma ṣaḍviṃśatitamaḥ //

line.left: / samāsata idamidaṃ nedam / evamidaṃ nānyatheti niścitādhimuktigocaro yadvastu sarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ paraṃparāgatayā saṃjñayā
line.right: na cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣyodgṛhītam / idamucyate lokaprasiddhatattvam / yuktiprasiddhatattvaṃ katamat / satāṃ

line.left: bhagavatāṃ dharmanairātmyapraveśāya praviṣṭena suviśuddhena ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatāmārabhya prajñaptivāda
line.right: jñānena yo gocaraviṣayaḥ sāsau paramā tathatā niruttarā jñeyaparyantagatā yasyāḥ sarva samyagdharmapravicayā nivartante

line.left: / dvayamucyate bhāvaścābhāvaśca / tatra bhāvo yaḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvo vyavasthāpitaḥ / tathaiva ca dīrghakālamabhiniviṣṭo lokena /
line.right: lokasya / tadyathā rūpamiti vā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamiti vā / cakṣuriti vā srotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana iti vā / pṛthivīti vā

line.left: / sa khalu bodhisattvastena dūrānupraviṣṭe na dharmanairātmyajñānena nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaṃ viditvā na
line.right: nānyatra vastumātraṃ gṛhṇāti tathatāmātram / na cāsyaivaṃ bhavati vastumātraṃ vā etattathatāmātraṃ caiti / arthe tu sa

line.left: / asadbhū tasamāropāsaṃgrāhavivarjitaśca bhūtāpavādāsaṃgrāhavivarjitaśca vidyate / sa punaḥ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ

line.left: prādurbhāvāya / tatsaṃbhāvācca punarniyataṃ tadadhiṣṭhānasyāpi tadāśritasya vikalpasya prādurbhāvo bhavati / kathañca punarasya
line.right: parijñānaṃ bhavati / catasṛbhiḥ paryeṣaṇābhiḥ caturvidhena ca yathābhūtaparijñānena / catasraḥ paryeṣaṇāḥ katamāḥ / nāmaparyeṣaṇā /

line.left: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / idamucyate viśeṣaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānam / tatra yo 'sāvaṣṭavidho
line.right: bālānāṃ trivastujanako lokanirvartakaḥ so 'sya caturvidhasya yathābhūtaparijñānasya vaikalyādasamavadhānātpravartate / tasmācca

line.left: bālānāṃ trivastujanako lokanirvartakaḥ so 'sya caturvidhasya yathābhūtaparijñānasya vaikalyādasamavadhānātpravartate / tasmācca
line.right: / saṃkleśātsaṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ saṃsārasaṃsṛteḥ saṃsārānugataṃ jātijarāvyādhimaraṇādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pravartate / yadā ca bodhisattvena

line.left: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pravartate / yadā ca bodhisattvena caturvidhaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ niśritya so 'ṣṭavidho
line.right: parijñāto bhavati dṛṣṭe dharme tasya samyak parijñānādāyatyāṃ tadadhiṣṭhānasya tadālambanasya prapañcapatitasya </page><page> vastunaḥ

line.left: tadadhiṣṭhānasya tadālambanasya prapañcapatitasya </page><page> vastunaḥ prādurbhāvo na bhavati / tasyānudayādaprādurbhāvāttadālambanasyāpi
line.right: prādurbhāvo na bhavati / evaṃ tasya savastukasya vikalpasya nirodho yaḥ sa sarvaprapañcanirodho veditavyaḥ / evañca prapañcanirodho

line.left: prādurbhāvo na bhavati / tasyānudayādaprādurbhāvāttadālambanasyāpi vikalpasyāyatyāṃ prādurbhāvo na bhavati / evaṃ tasya savastukasya
line.right: nirodho yaḥ sa sarvaprapañcanirodho veditavyaḥ / evañca prapañcanirodho bodhisattvasya mahāyānaparinirvāṇamiti veditavyam / dṛṣṭe ca

line.left: / prāgeva bodhisattvena sarvapariṣkārāḥ sarvadeyadharmā daśasu dikṣu viśaddhenāśayena buddhabodhisattvānāṃ visṛṣṭā bhavanti
line.right: nāma bhikṣurācāryāya vā upādhyāyāya vā cīvaraṃ vikalpayet / sa evaṃ vikalpahetoḥ sarvavicitrodārapariṣkāradeyadharmasannidhiprāpto

line.left: dikṣu viśaddhenāśayena buddhabodhisattvānāṃ visṛṣṭā bhavanti vikalpitāstadyathāpi nāma bhikṣurācāryāya vā upādhyāyāya vā cīvaraṃ
line.right: / sa evaṃ vikalpahetoḥ sarvavicitrodārapariṣkāradeyadharmasannidhiprāpto 'pyāryavaṃśavihārī bodhisattva ityucyate /

line.left: buddhabodhisattvānāṃ visṛṣṭā bhavanti vikalpitāstadyathāpi nāma bhikṣurācāryāya vā upādhyāyāya vā cīvaraṃ vikalpayet / sa evaṃ
line.right: sarvavicitrodārapariṣkāradeyadharmasannidhiprāpto 'pyāryavaṃśavihārī bodhisattva ityucyate / aprameyapuṇyaprasotā ca bhavati /

line.left: ahamasmi dātā dānapatiranye ca na tatheti / aniścitadānaṃ katamat / na hi bodhisattvaḥ kīrtiśabdaghoṣaślokaṃ niśritya dānaṃ dadāti /
line.right: ghoṣamātrapratibaddhāṃ vṛṣamatropamāṃ kīrtiṃ manyamānaḥ / alīnaṃ dānaṃ katamat / iha bodhisattvaḥ pūrvameva dānāt sumanā bhavati /

line.right: kāyikacaittasikaprasrabdhijanakaṃ paramapraśāntaṃ manyanāpagatamanāsvāditaṃ sarvanimittāpagataṃ dhyānam / idameṣāṃ

line.left: dharmanairātmyamārabhya satyāvabodhāya vā satyāvabodhakāle vā satyābhisaṃbodhādvā urddhaṃ prajñā paramapraśamapratyupasthānā
line.right: sarvaṃprapañcāgatā sarvaṃdharmeṣu samatānugatā mahāsāmānyalakṣaṇapraviṣṭā jñeyaparyantagatā samāropāpavādāntadvaya

line.left: tathā stokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādeśikena mṛdukṣāntikenāpi jñānena nirabhilāpyadharmasvabhāvatathatādhimukto
line.right: nirnimittena cetasā viharati / prāgeva tata uttari tato bhūyaḥ / tathā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvaraparipālanā / śamathavipaśyanāyāṃ

line.left: dharmamātrasaṃjñī dharmamātre sattvopacāramāśayataḥ saṃpaśyaṃstāmeva maitrīṃ bhāvayati / iyamasya dharmālambanā maitrī veditavyā /
line.right: maitrīṃ bhāvayati / iyamasyānālambanā maitrī veditavyā / yathā sattvālambanā dharmālambanā 'nālambanā maitrī evaṃ karuṇā muditopekṣā

line.left: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / iha bodhisattvaḥ kāye kāyānudarśī viharan naiva kāyaṃ kāyabhāvato
line.right: / nāpi sarveṇa sarvamabhāvataḥ / tañca kāyanirabhilāpyasvabhāvadharmatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / iyamasya paramārthikī kāye

line.left: smṛtyupasthānaṃ evamavaśiṣṭāni smṛtyupasthānāni aviśiṣṭāśca bodhipakṣyā dharmā veditavyāḥ / sa naiva kāyādīndharmān duḥkhato vā
line.right: samudayato vā / nāpi tatkṛtaṃ prahāṇaṃ nirodhataḥ kalpayati / nāpi tatprāptihetuṃ mārgataḥ kalpayati / nirabhilāpyasvabhāvadharmatayā

line.left: / saṃvṛttyā punarapramāṇavyavasthāna-nayajñānānugatā bodhisattvasya satyālambanabhāvanā dṛṣṭavyā / tatra yā bodhisattvasyaiṣā
line.right: so 'sya śamatho draṣṭavyaḥ / yacca tadyathābhūtajñānaṃ pāramārthikaṃ yacca tadapramāṇa-vyavasthānanayajñānaṃ dharmeṣu iyamasya

line.left: pāramārthikasāṃketika-jñānaphalaṃ sarvaprapañcasaṃjñāsu anābhogavāhanaḥ tasmiṃśca nirabhilāpye vastumātrai nirnimittatayā ca
line.right: sarvadharmasamataikarasagāmī / ebhiścaturbhirākāraibodhisattvānāṃ śamathamārgaḥ pravartate

line.left: tadā rūpābhāvamātrātmakameva pariśuddhamākāśaṃ khyāti / evaṃ tasminnākāśasthānīye nirabhilāpye vastuni vividhābhilāpakṛtāḥ saṃjñā
line.right: prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ rūpakarmasthānīyāḥ pravartante / sarveṣāñca teṣāmabhilāpakṛtānāṃ saṃjñāvikalpānāṃ prapañcasaṃjñānugatānāṃ

line.left: vividhābhilāpakṛtāḥ saṃjñā vikalpāḥ prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ rūpakarmasthānīyāḥ pravartante / sarveṣāñca teṣāmabhilāpakṛtānāṃ
line.right: prapañcasaṃjñānugatānāṃ citrarūpakarmasthānīyānāṃ tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastvākāśa sthānīyamavakāśaṃ dadāti / yadā ca

line.left: tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastvākāśa sthānīyamavakāśaṃ dadāti / yadā ca punarbodhisattvairjñānenāryeṇa te 'bhilāpasamutthitā
line.right: prapañcasaṃjñānugatāḥ sarveṇa sarvamapanītā bhavanti tadā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ paramāryāṇāṃ tenāryajñānena tannirabhilāpyaṃ vastu

line.left: sthitiḥ / ayamasyocyate śūnyatāsamādhiḥ / apraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ katamaḥ / iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu
line.right: kleśena duḥkhena ca parigṛhītatvādanekadoṣaduṣṭaṃ samanupaśyato yā āyatyāṃ tatrāpraṇidhānapūrvikā cittasthitiḥ /

line.left: / ayamasyāpraṇihitaḥ samādhirityucyate / animittaḥ samādhiḥ katamaḥ / iha bodhisattvasya tadeva nirabhilāpyasvabhāvaṃ vastu
line.right: nimittānyapanīya yathābhūtaṃ śāntato manasi kurvato yā cittasthitiḥ / ayamasyocyate animittaḥ samādhiḥ / kasmātpunareṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ

line.left: / yathā śrāvakayānamevaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaprajñaptivyavasthānam / nirabhilāpyaṃ vastvālambanīkṛtya sarvadharmeṣu yā tathatā
line.right: niryāṇatā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśraya ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma sambhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yatphalam / ityebhiḥ

line.left: vihāraḥ / yastameva trividhamapyadhiprajñavihāramadhipatiṃ kṛtvā 'bhisaṃskāreṇābhogena niśchidranirantaraḥ sarvadharmeṣu
line.right: sahagato vihāraḥ / tatra katamo bodhisattvānāṃ anabhisaṃskāro 'nābhogo nirnimitto vihāraḥ / </page><page> yastasyaiva pūrvakasya nirnimittasya

line.left: / teṣāṃ sattvānāmatyantaduḥkhavimokṣopāyaṃ sarvakleśānāvaraṇajñānameva paśyati / </page><page> tasya ca vimokṣasya samudāgamāya dharmadhātau
line.right: prajñāṃ paśyati / tasya ca jñānālokasya niṣpattaye samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paśyati / tañca dhyānasamādhisamāpattinirhāraṃ

line.left: jñānasya niṣprapañcasamatayā ādānatyāgābhisaṃskāravigamasamatayā ca tasyaiva kleśaduḥkhasaṃkleśa-visaṃyogād viviktasamatayā
line.right: jñeyasvabhāvasya māyānirmitopamasamatayā nirvikalpajñānagocarasya svabhāvasya bhāvābhāvādvayasamatayā / ityayaṃ tāsāṃ daśānāṃ

line.left: ca tasyaiva kleśaduḥkhasaṃkleśa-visaṃyogād viviktasamatayā vikalpitasya jñeyasvabhāvasya māyānirmitopamasamatayā
line.right: svabhāvasya bhāvābhāvādvayasamatayā / ityayaṃ tāsāṃ daśānāṃ dharmasamatānāmarthavibhāgo veditavyaḥ / so 'sminvihāre sthitaḥ sattveṣu

line.left: samāsato veditavyaḥ / sa ebhiryukto 'pramāṇamasaṃkhyeyaṃ tathāgataviṣayaṃ pratividhyati / tatsamutthānāya </page><page>
line.right: 'pramāṇabuddhiviṣaya-samutthānaṃ paśyan nirantaraṃ niścchidraṃ prayujyate sarveryāpatha-cāravihāramanasikāreṣu / nāsya

line.left: / teṣāñca lābhātsamatikrānto bhavati śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamādhiviṣayam / sa evaṃ sarvakleśaviviktena durvijñeyena
line.right: kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā viharati / na cottariviśeṣaparimārgaṇābhiyogamutsṛjati sattvāpekṣayā / bodhiparipūrṇārthaṃ tasyāpramāṇaṃ

line.left: tadajñānamithyābhiniveśahetukāñca tasminvidyamāne vastuni nirabhilāpye ādau madhye paryavasāne sarvakālasaṃkleśasamatāṃ cārabhya
line.right: ca tatsaṃkleśāpanayanamārabhya / ityasya jñānasya daśākārasyādhimātratvātparipūrṇatvādimamaṣṭamaṃ pariśuddhaṃ vihāramavatarati /

line.left: katamā / catasṛbhiḥ paryeṣaṇābhirayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvadhamān paryeṣya yadā caturbhireva yathābhūtaparijñānaiḥ parijānāti / tadā
line.right: sarvadharmāṇāṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarvasaṃlkeśānutpattyanukūlatāṃ paśyati / samparāye ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ niravaśeṣato 'nutpatiṃ paśyati

line.left: dṛṣṭe ca dharme sarvasaṃlkeśānutpattyanukūlatāṃ paśyati / samparāye ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ niravaśeṣato 'nutpatiṃ paśyati teṣāmeva
line.right: dharmāṇām / tāḥ punaḥ catasraḥ paryeṣaṇā yathāpūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭāstattvārthapaṭale / catvāri ca yathābhūtaparijñānāni

line.left: vidyate / anāmakāḥ sarvadharmā nāmna tu paridīpitāḥ // </page><page> asadbhūtā hy amī dharmāḥ kalpanātāḥ samutthitāḥ / sāpy atra kalpanā nāsti yāyā śūnyā
line.right: // cakṣusā paśyate rūpaṃ yad uktaṃ tattvadarśinā / mithyābhimāninā loke saṃvṛtyā satyaṃ āḥṛtam // </page><page> sāmagrayāṃ darśanaṃ yatra prakāśayati

line.left: / svabhāvaśūnyatā ... paramārthaśūnyatā ... paramaśūnyatā ... mahāśūnyatā ... saṃprayogaśūnyatā ... abhinirhāraśūnyatā

line.right: paripūrayitavya iti / sa evaṃ supratyavekṣitajñānābhijñaḥ satatasamitamabhiyuktopāyaprajñāparibhāviteṣu

line.left: asaṃbhūtatāṃ ca avināśitāṃ ca aniṣṭhitatāṃ ca apravṛttitāṃ ca anabhinivṛttitāṃ ca abhāvasvabhāvatāṃ ca ādimadhyaparyavasānasamatāṃ ca
line.right: ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtamavatarati / sa sarvaśaścittamanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāpagato 'navagṛhītākāśasamo

line.left: ca ādimadhyaparyavasānasamatāṃ ca tathatāvikalpasarvajñajñānapraveśatāṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtamavatarati / sa
line.right: 'navagṛhītākāśasamo 'bhyavakāśaprakṛtito 'vatīrṇo 'nutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāpta ityucyate // tatra bhavanto jinaputrā evaṃ

line.left: / tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrā bhikṣurṛddhimāṃścetovaśipāramitāprāpto 'nupūrveṇa navamaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpannaḥ
line.right: bhavati , evameva bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo 'syā aṣṭamyā acalāyā bodhisattvabhūmeḥ sahapratilambhātsarvābhogavigato

line.left: 'syā aṣṭamyā acalāyā bodhisattvabhūmeḥ sahapratilambhātsarvābhogavigato 'nābhogadharmatāprāptaḥ kāyavākcittautsukyāpagataḥ
line.right: vipākadharmatāvasthito bhavati / tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato mahaughaprāptamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte / sa

line.left: yadidaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ / naitayā tathāgatā eva kevalaṃ prabhāvyante , sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā api
line.right: / api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra prekṣasva tāvat tvamasmākaṃ kāyāpramāṇatāṃ ca jñānāpramāṇatāṃ ca buddhakṣetrāpramāṇatāṃ ca

line.left: ca svarāṅgaviśuddhyapramāṇatāṃ ca / tathaiva tvamapyabhinirhāramutpādaya / api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra ekastveṣa āloko yo 'yaṃ
line.right: / īdṛśāstu kulaputra dharmālokāstathāgatānāmaparyantagatā aparyantakṛtā aparyantabaddhāḥ , yeṣāṃ saṃkhyā nāsti , gaṇanā

line.left: yāvanto 'nabhilāpyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvānāmupapattyāyatanādhimuktiprasarāsteṣu tathatvāya svakāyavibhaktimādarśayati // sa
line.right: kāyasamatāprāptaḥ ( taccāsya kāyasaṃdarśanamakṣūṇamavandhyaṃ ca sattvaparipākavinayāya ) sa sattvakāyaṃ ca prajānāti / kṣetrakāyaṃ ca

line.left: jinadharmaniṣpattijagatparitrāyaṇārthāḥ / mahākṛpocayavartanadharmacakraṃ jinakṣetraśodhamupapadyati cittaśreṣṭham // 2 //
line.right: nānāvidhe jagati kālaviśodhanārtham / saṃkṣepasarvaguṇa eṣitu nāyakānām ākāśatulya samudeti udāracittam // 3 // prajñādhipatya

line.left: eva śabdā ravante jina kṛtu sumanojñaiḥ kleśatāpasya hantā // 4 // śūnya prakṛtiśāntā sarvadharmānimittāḥ khagapathasamatulyā
line.right: viśuddhāḥ / gatisthitivinirvṛttā niṣprapañcā aśeṣā tathatasama tathatvāddharmatā nirvikalpā // 5 // yaiḥ punaranubuddhāḥ

line.left: khagapathasamatulyā nirvikalpā viśuddhāḥ / gatisthitivinirvṛttā niṣprapañcā aśeṣā tathatasama tathatvāddharmatā
line.right: // 5 // yaiḥ punaranubuddhāḥ sarvadharmeva teṣāṃ bhāvi tatha abhāve iñjanā nāsti kācit / kṛpa karuṇa jage ca mocanārthaṃ prayuktāste hi

line.left: alakṣaṇatā ajātā / anutpāda ādipariśuddhyatiniṣprapañcā bhāvetva jñānamati ṣaṣṭhi samākramanti // 11 // dharmā vivikta apratigraha
line.right: māyāsvabhāva dvayabhāvatu viprayuktā / anulomayanta avilomanta dharmanetrī jñānānvitāḥ pravara ṣaṣṭhi samākramanti // 12 //

line.left: / pratibhāsa māya supinādvayadharmacārī kṛpa darśayanti vidu saptamimākramanti // 15 // śodhenti kṣetra khasamāśaya

line.left: hi tathā citraṃ kalpyamānaṃ na sidhyati // Lank_ 2 . 1 8 2 // nimittaṃ dauṣṭhulyamayaṃ bandhanaṃ cittasaṃbhavam / parikalpitaṃ hyajānānaṃ
line.right: // Lank_ 2 . 1 8 3 // yadetatkalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ paratantraṃ tadeva hi / kalpitaṃ hi vicitrābhaṃ paratantre vikalpyate // Lank_ 2 . 1 8 4 // saṃvṛtiḥ

line.left: hyajānānaṃ paratantrairvikalpyate // Lank_ 2 . 1 8 3 // yadetatkalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ paratantraṃ tadeva hi / kalpitaṃ hi vicitrābhaṃ paratantre
line.right: // Lank_ 2 . 1 8 4 // saṃvṛtiḥ paramārthaśca tṛtīyaṃ nāstihetukam / kalpitaṃ saṃvṛtirhyuktā tacchedādāryagocaram // Lank_ 2 . 1 8 5 // yathā hi

line.left: nārūpaṃ paratantraṃ tathābudhaiḥ // Lank_ 2 . 1 8 7 // haimaṃ syāttu yathā śuddhaṃ jalaṃ kaluṣavarjitam / gaganaṃ hi ghanābhāvāttathā śuddhaṃ
line.right: // Lank_ 2 . 1 88 // </page><page> nāsti vai kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraśca vidyate / samāropāpavādaṃ hi vikalpanto vinaśyati // Lank_ 2 . 1 8 9 // kalpitaṃ

line.left: / gaganaṃ hi ghanābhāvāttathā śuddhaṃ vikalpitam // Lank_ 2 . 1 88 // </page><page> nāsti vai kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraśca vidyate / samāropāpavādaṃ hi
line.right: vinaśyati // Lank_ 2 . 1 8 9 // kalpitaṃ yadyabhāvaṃ syātparatantrasvabhāvataḥ / vinā bhāvena vai bhāvo bhāvaścābhāvasaṃbhavaḥ // Lank_ 2 . 1 9

line.left: tu pāratantryātpravartate // Lank_ 2 . 1 9 5 // buddhyā vivecyamānaṃ tu na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam / niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhyā
line.right: // Lank_ 2 . 1 9 6 // niṣpanno vidyate bhāvo bhāvābhāvavivarjitaḥ / bhāvābhāvavinirmukto dvau svabhāvau kathaṃ nu tau // Lank_ 2 . 1 9 7 //

line.left: dvau svabhāvau dvau pratiṣṭhitau / kalpitaṃ dṛśyate citraṃ viśuddhaṃ cāryagocaram // Lank_ 2 . 1 9 8 // kalpitaṃ hi vicitrābhaṃ
line.right: / anyathā kalpyamānaṃ hi tīrthyavādaṃ samāśrayet // Lank_ 2 . 1 99 // kalpanā kalpitetyuktaṃ darśanāddhetusaṃbhavat /

line.left: / bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt / bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat

line.right: ekayānāvabodhaḥ kṛto bhavati / eṣa ekayānāvabodho mahāmate nānyatīrthyaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabrahmādibhiḥ prāptapūrvo 'nyatra mayā /

line.left: ityucyate / svasāmānyabāhyasvacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhakānāṃ mahāmate aṣṭānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ
line.right: duṣṭacittarudhirotpādanādānantaryakārītyucyate / etāni mahāmate ādhyātmikāni pañcānantaryāṇi yānyadhyāpadya kulaputro vā

line.left: kariṣyata iti kṛtvā nirmitādhiṣṭhānābhisamayaḥ pradarśyate mayā / nāstyekāntena mahāmate ānantaryakāriṇo 'bhisamayaḥ anyatra
line.right: - citkarhicitkalyāṇamitramāsādya anyagatisaṃdhau svavikalpadoṣairvimucyate // tatredamucyate - tṛṣṇā hi mātā ityuktā avidyā ca pitā

line.left: citkarhicitkalyāṇamitramāsādya anyagatisaṃdhau
line.right: // tatredamucyate - tṛṣṇā hi mātā ityuktā avidyā ca pitā tathā / viṣayāvabodhādvijñānaṃ buddha ityupadiśyate // Lank_ 3 . 3 // arhanto

line.left: / iyaṃ mahāmate akṣarasamatā / tatra mahāmate katamā vāksamatā tathāgatānāmarhatā samyaksaṃbuddhānām ? yaduta mamāpi catuṣṣaṣṭyākāro
line.right: pravartate , teṣāmapi mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevameva catuṣṣaṣṭyākāro brahmasvararutaghoṣo vāgvikalpaḥ

line.left: pravartate , teṣāmapi mahāmate tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevameva catuṣṣaṣṭyākāro brahmasvararutaghoṣo
line.right: pravartate 'nūnānadhikā nirviśiṣṭāḥ kalaviṅkabrahmasvararutaghoṣasvabhāvena / tatra katamā kāyasamatā ? yaduta ahaṃ ca te ca tathāgatā

line.left: svapratyātmadharmatānusaṃdhiḥ katamaḥ ? yattaistathāgatairadhigataṃ tanmayāpyadhigatamanūnamanadhikaṃ svapratyātmagatigocaraṃ
line.right: / tatra paurāṇasthitidharmatā katamā ? yaduta paurāṇamidaṃ mahāmate dharmatāvanme hiraṇyarajatamuktākaravanmahāmate

line.left: bhavati / tatra mahāmate kathaṃ nāstitvaniśrito bhavati ? yaduta rāgadveṣamohābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā punarapi rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhāvaṃ
line.right: / yaśca mahāmate bhāvānāmastitvaṃ nābhyupaiti bhāvalakṣaṇaviviktatvāt , yaśca buddhaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ

line.left: skandhadhātvāyatanāni saṃtatiprabandhena vinivṛtya vinivartanta iti kalpākṣararahitāni
line.right: punarapi vaināśiko bhavati // tatredamucyate - astināstītyubhāvantau yāvaccittasya gocaraḥ / gocareṇa niruddhena samyakcittaṃ

line.left: 'stitvaṃ kathaṃ nāsti bhaviṣyati // Lank_ 3 . 1 2 // kena prasādhitāstitvaṃ pratyayairyasya nāstitā / utpādavādadurdṛṣṭyā nāstyastīti
line.right: // Lank_ 3 . 1 3 // yasya notpadyate kiṃcinna ca kiṃcinnirudhyate / tasyāstināsti nopaiti viviktaṃ paśyato jagat // Lank_ 3 . 1 4 // atha khalu

line.left: yaduta siddhāntanayaśca deśanānayaśca / tatra siddhāntanayo mahāmate yaduta pratyātmādhigamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ
line.right: pratyātmagatibhūmigatisvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvatarkatīrthyamāravarjitam / vinihatya ca tāṃstīrthyamārān pratyātmagatirvirājate /

line.left: siddhāntaśca nayaścāpi pratyātmaśāsanaṃ ca vai / ye paśyanti vibhāgajñā na te tarkavaśaṃ gatāḥ // Lank_ 3 . 1 5 // </page><page> na bhāvo vidyate satyaṃ yathā
line.right: / abhāvena tu vai mokṣaṃ kathaṃ necchanti tārkikāḥ // Lank_ 3 . 1 6 // utpādabhaṅgasaṃbaddhaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ pratipaśyataḥ / dṛṣṭidvayaṃ

line.left: prapuṣṇanti na paśyanti viparyayāt // Lank_ 3 . 1 7 // ekameva bhavetsatyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ manavarjitam / kadalīskandhamāyābhaṃ lokaṃ
line.right: // Lank_ 3 . 1 8 // rāgo na vidyate dveṣo mohaścāpi na pudgalaḥ / tṛṣṇāyā hyuditāḥ skandhā vidyante svapnasādṛśāḥ // Lank_ 3 . 1 9 // atha khalu

line.left: ? abhūtaparikalpo 'bhūtaparikalpa iti bhagavannucyate / katamasyaitadbhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta abhūtaparikalpa iti ? kiṃ vā
line.right: abhūtaparikalpo bhavati ? bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu mahāmate / sādhu khalu punastvaṃ mahāmate , yattvametamarthamadhyeṣitavyaṃ manyase /

line.left: mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt / bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - arthavividhavaicitryābhūtaparikalpābhiniveśānmahāmate
line.right: pravartamānaḥ pravartate / nṛṇāṃ grāhyagrāhakābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭānāṃ ca mahāmate svacittadṛśyamātrānavadhāritamatīnāṃ ca

line.right: bāhyavicitrārthopalambhābhiniveśāccittacaittakalāpo vikalpasaṃśabditaḥ pravartamānaḥ pravartate ātmātmīyābhiniveśāt /

line.left: / bhagavānāha - evametanmahāmate yathā vadasi / na mahāmate yathā bālapṛthagjanairbhāvasvabhāvo
line.right: , tathā bhavati / parikalpita evāsau mahāmate , na bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇāvadhāraṇam / kiṃ tu yathā mahāmate āryairbhāvasvabhāvo

line.left: āryairāryeṇa jñānena āryeṇa darśanena āryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā na divyamāṃsacakṣuṣā bhāvasvabhāvo 'vadhāryate tathā bhavati , na tu yathā
line.right: bhāvasvabhāvaḥ , tatkathaṃ bhagavan bālapṛthagjanānāṃ vikalpavyāvṛttirbhaviṣyati āryabhāvavastvanavabodhāt ? na ca te bhagavan

line.left: 'vadhāryate tathā bhavati , na tu yathā bālapṛthagjanairvikalpyate bhāvasvabhāvaḥ , tatkathaṃ bhagavan bālapṛthagjanānāṃ
line.right: āryabhāvavastvanavabodhāt ? na ca te bhagavan viparyastāḥ nāviparyastāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ ? yaduta

line.left: / tatkasya hetoḥ ? yaduta āryavastusvabhāvānavabodhātsadasatorlakṣaṇasya vṛttidarśanāt / āryairapi bhagavan yathā vastu
line.right: , na tathā bhavati svalakṣaṇaviṣayāgocaratvāt / sa teṣāmapi bhagavan bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ parikalpitasvabhāva eva khyāyate

line.left: bhagavan bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇānavabodhāt / na ca bhagavan parikalpitasvabhāvahetuko bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ / sa ca kathaṃ parikalpena
line.right: na tathā bhaviṣyati yathā parikalpyate ? anyadeva bhagavan prativikalpasya lakṣaṇam , anyadeva svabhāvalakṣaṇam / visadṛśahetuke ca

line.left: bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ / sa ca kathaṃ parikalpena prativikalpyamāno na tathā bhaviṣyati yathā parikalpyate ? anyadeva bhagavan
line.right: lakṣaṇam , anyadeva svabhāvalakṣaṇam / visadṛśahetuke ca bhagavan vikalpasvabhāvalakṣaṇe / te ca parasparaṃ parikalpyamāne

line.left: bhaviṣyati yathā parikalpyate ? anyadeva bhagavan prativikalpasya lakṣaṇam , anyadeva svabhāvalakṣaṇam / visadṛśahetuke ca bhagavan
line.right: / te ca parasparaṃ parikalpyamāne bālapṛthagjanairna tathā bhaviṣyataḥ / kiṃ tu sattvānāṃ vikalpavyāvṛttyarthamidamucyate / yathā

line.left: ca bhagavan vikalpasvabhāvalakṣaṇe / te ca parasparaṃ parikalpyamāne bālapṛthagjanairna tathā bhaviṣyataḥ / kiṃ tu sattvānāṃ

line.left: nirdekṣyanti / ātmātmīyalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrānavabodhājjñānaṃ jñeyaṃ prativikalpayanti / te ca
line.right: bāhyabhāvābhāvapravicayānupalabdherucchedadṛṣṭimāśrayante // tatredamucyate - vidyamānaṃ hi ālambyaṃ yadi jñānaṃ na paśyati /

line.left: jñānaṃ yadi na jāyate / vidyamānaṃ hi tajjñeyaṃ mithyājñānaṃ taducyate // Lank_ 3 . 6 0 // punaraparaṃ mahāmate bālapṛthagjanā
line.right: nāṭake nṛtyantaḥ svasiddhāntanayadeśanāyāmakuśalāḥ svacittadṛśyabāhyabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭā upāyadeśanāpāṭhamabhiniviśante ,

line.left: / yathācittādhimuktikatayā deśayanti sattvebhyaḥ / tatra siddhāntanayaḥ punarmahāmate katamaḥ ? yena yoginaḥ
line.right: kurvanti yaduta ekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvapakṣāpatanatācittamanomanovijñānātītaṃ svapratyātmāryagatigocaraṃ

line.left: deśayāmi / tatkasya hetoḥ ? yaduta bāhyabhāvābhāvādanabhiniveśātsvacittadṛśyamātrāvasthānāddidhāvṛttino
line.right: / nimittagocarābhāvātsvacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhanātsvacittadṛśyavikalpo na pravartate /

line.left: deśayāmi / tatkasya hetoḥ ? yaduta bāhyabhāvābhāvādanabhiniveśātsvacittadṛśyamātrāvasthānāddidhāvṛttino 'pravṛttervikalpasya /
line.right: na pravartate / apravṛttivikalpasyānimittaśūnyatāpraṇihitavimokṣatrayāvatārānmukta ityucyate // abhijānāmyahaṃ mahāmate

line.left: 'pravṛttervikalpasya / nimittagocarābhāvātsvacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhanātsvacittadṛśyavikalpo na pravartate /
line.right: ityucyate // abhijānāmyahaṃ mahāmate anyatarasmin pṛthivīpradeśe viharāmi / atha yenāhaṃ tena lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa upasaṃkrāntaḥ /

line.left: mahā - yadi bho brāhmaṇa evam , idamapi brāhmaṇa lokāyatameva bhavatīti , na madīyam / tvadīyametadbrāhmaṇa lokāyatam / ahaṃ bho brāhmaṇa
line.right: tribhavaṃ varṇayāmi / svacittadṛśyamātrānavabodhādbrāhmaṇa vikalpaḥ pravartate na bāhyabhāvopalambhāt / yathā

line.left: / ahaṃ bho brāhmaṇa anādikālaprapañcavikalpavāsanādauṣṭhulyahetukaṃ tribhavaṃ varṇayāmi / svacittadṛśyamātrānavabodhādbrāhmaṇa
line.right: pravartate na bāhyabhāvopalambhāt / yathā tīrthakarāṇāmātmendriyārthasaṃnikarṣātrayāṇāṃ na tathā mama / ahaṃ bhe brāhmaṇa na hetuvādī

line.left: / yathā tīrthakarāṇāmātmendriyārthasaṃnikarṣātrayāṇāṃ na tathā mama / ahaṃ bhe brāhmaṇa na hetuvādī nāhetuvādī anyatra
line.right: grāhyagrāhakabhāvena prajñāpya pratītyasamutpādaṃ deśayāmi / na ca tvādṛśā anye vā budhyante ātmagrāhapatitayā saṃtatyā /

line.left: lokāyatam / svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitā bho gautama sarvabhāvāḥ / idamapi brāhmaṇa lokāyatameva bhavati / yāvadbrāhmaṇa manovispanditaṃ
line.right: tāvallokāyatam // punaraparaṃ mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇo māmetadavocat - asti bho gautama kiṃcidyanna lokāyatam ? madīyameva bho

line.left: / kiṃ tadalokāyataṃ yanna prasiddhaṃ deśyate ca ? asti ca bho brāhmaṇa alokāyataṃ yatra sarvatīrthakarāṇāṃ tava ca buddhirna gāhate
line.right: / yaduta vikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ sadasataḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādvikalpo na pravartate / bāhyaviṣayagrahaṇābhāvādvikalpaḥ

line.left: bho brāhmaṇa alokāyataṃ yatra sarvatīrthakarāṇāṃ tava ca buddhirna gāhate bāhyabhāvādasadbhūtavikalpaprapañcābhiniviṣṭānām / yaduta
line.right: sadasataḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādvikalpo na pravartate / bāhyaviṣayagrahaṇābhāvādvikalpaḥ svasthāne 'vatiṣṭhate dṛśyate /

line.left: tava ca buddhirna gāhate bāhyabhāvādasadbhūtavikalpaprapañcābhiniviṣṭānām / yaduta vikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ sadasataḥ
line.right: na pravartate / bāhyaviṣayagrahaṇābhāvādvikalpaḥ svasthāne 'vatiṣṭhate dṛśyate / tenedamalokāyataṃ madīyaṃ na ca tvadīyam / svasthāne

line.left: / yaduta vikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ sadasataḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādvikalpo na pravartate /
line.right: svasthāne 'vatiṣṭhate dṛśyate / tenedamalokāyataṃ madīyaṃ na ca tvadīyam / svasthāne 'vatiṣṭhata iti na pravartata ityarthaḥ /

line.left: svasthāne 'vatiṣṭhate dṛśyate / tenedamalokāyataṃ madīyaṃ na ca tvadīyam / svasthāne 'vatiṣṭhata iti na pravartata ityarthaḥ /
line.right: / evamidaṃ bho brāhmaṇa yanna lokāyatam / saṃkṣepato brāhmaṇa yatra vijñānasyāgatirgatiścyutirupapattiḥ prārthanābhiniveśābhiṣvaṅgo

line.left: nigṛhīto 'ntarhito 'pṛṣṭvaiva māṃ svanayapratyavasthānakathāṃ cintayan śākyaputro mannayabahirdhā varāko 'pravṛttilakṣaṇahetuvādī
line.right: varṇayati / tvaṃ caitarhi mahāmate māṃ pṛcchasi - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ lokāyatikavicitramantrapratibhānaṃ sevyamānasyāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na

line.left: yaṃ lokāyatikaṃ sevamāno labhate lokāyatam // tatra mahāmate dharmasaṃgrahaḥ katamaḥ ? yaduta svacittadharmanairātmyadvayāva
line.right: , bhūmyuttaroparijñānāccittamanomanovijñānavyāvṛttiḥ , sarvabuddhajñānābhiṣekagatiḥ anadhiṣṭhāpadaparigrahaḥ

line.left: , sarvabuddhajñānābhiṣekagatiḥ anadhiṣṭhāpadaparigrahaḥ sarvadharmānābhogavaśavartitā dharma ityucyate ,
line.right: / prāyeṇa hi mahāmate tīrthakaravādo bālānantadvaye pātayati na tu viduṣām , yaduta ucchede ca śāśvate ca /

line.left: dvidhā cittaṃ hi dṛśyate / grāhyagrāhakabhāvena śāśvatocchedavarjitam // Lank_ 3 . 6 5 // </page><page> yāvatpravartate cittaṃ tāvallokāyataṃ bhavet /

line.left: mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇamiti bhagavannucyate / kasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yaduta nirvāṇamiti

line.left: tīrthakarāḥ skandhadhātvāyatananirodhādviṣayavairāgyānnivaidharmyādarśanāccittacaittakalāpo na pravartate /
line.right: varṇayanti / atasteṣāṃ tatra nirvāṇabuddhirbhavati / na ca mahāmate vināśadṛṣṭyā nirvāyate // anye punardeśāntarasthānagamanaṃ mokṣa

line.left: atasteṣāṃ tatra nirvāṇabuddhirbhavati / na ca mahāmate vināśadṛṣṭyā nirvāyate // anye punardeśāntarasthānagamanaṃ mokṣa iti varṇayanti
line.right: pavanavat / anye punarvarṇayanti tīrthakarāḥ buddhiboddhavyadarśanavināśānmokṣa iti / anye

line.left: iti varṇayanti viṣayavikalpoparamādiṣu pavanavat / anye punarvarṇayanti tīrthakarāḥ buddhiboddhavyadarśanavināśānmokṣa iti / anye
line.right: kalpayanti / anye punarvarṇayanti vividhanimittavikalpo duḥkhajanmavāhaka iti svacittadṛśyamātrākuśalāḥ / nimittabhayabhītā

line.left: buddhiboddhavyadarśanavināśānmokṣa iti / anye vikalpasyāpravṛtternityānityadarśanānmokṣaṃ kalpayanti / anye punarvarṇayanti
line.right: duḥkhajanmavāhaka iti svacittadṛśyamātrākuśalāḥ / nimittabhayabhītā nimittadarśanātsukhābhilāṣanimitte nirvāṇabuddhayo bhavanti

line.left: bhavanti / anye svabhāvataḥ pravṛttito mayūravaicitryavividharatnākarakaṇṭakataikṣṇyavadbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇaṃ
line.right: / anye punarmahāmate pañcaviṃśatitattvāvabodhāt , anye prajāpālena ṣāḍguṇyopadeśagrahaṇānnirvāṇaṃ </page><page> kalpayanti / anye

line.left: varṇayanti sarvajñasiṃhanādanādino yathā svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādbāhyabhāvābhāvānabhiniveśāccātuṣkoṭikarahitād
line.right: grāhyagrāhakānupalabdheḥ sarvapramāṇāgrahaṇāpravṛttidarśanāttattvasya vyāmohakatvādagrahaṇaṃ tattvasya ,

line.left: tānyayuktiyuktāni vidvadbhiḥ parivarjitāni / sarve 'pyete mahāmate antadvayapatitayā saṃtatyā nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /

line.left: tac cārthābhāvajñānaṃ / tad eva vijñaptimātrajñānaṃ nivartayati / arthābhāve vijñaptyasaṃbhavād ity etad atra sādharmyaṃ / samyaktve 'pi
line.right: 'ntaḥ mithyātve 'pi bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ samyaktvena kalpayato mithyātvena vā etasyāntadvayasya parivarjanārthaṃ /

line.right: 'ntaḥ / avyāpṛtāv api jñānasya buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ niḥsāmarthyaṃ vā kalpayataḥ / etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ /

line.right: parivarjanārthaṃ / tailapradyotadṛṣṭāntaḥ / ajanmatve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ samakālatve 'pi yadi pratipakṣasyānutpattiṃ vā kalpayati

line.left: buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ niḥsāmarthyaṃ vā kalpayataḥ / etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ / tailapradyotadṛṣṭāntaḥ / ajanmatve 'pi
line.right: 'ntaḥ samakālatve 'pi yadi pratipakṣasyānutpattiṃ vā kalpayati saṃkleśasyaiva vā dīrghakālatvam etasya vikalpadvayāntasya

line.left: / ajanmatve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ samakālatve 'pi yadi pratipakṣasyānutpattiṃ vā kalpayati saṃkleśasyaiva vā dīrghakālatvam etasya
line.right: parivarjanārthaṃ dvitīyas tailapradyotadṛṣṭāntaḥ / uktāntadvayaparivarjane pratipattiḥ / [ e . Viśisṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca pratipattiḥ ]

line.left: / manaskārāviparyāsena viparyāsanidānaṃ parivarjayati / avisārāviparyāsena tannimittaṃ sugṛhītaṃ karoti / svalakṣaṇāviparyāsena
line.right: mārgaṃ bhāvayati / sāmānyalakṣaṇāviparyāsena vyavadānaprakṛtiṃ pratividhyati / aśuddhiśuddhimanaskārāviparyāsena

line.left: | śrāvakayānaṃ budhavacanaṃ na mahāyānam iti na yujyate vinā buddhayānena buddhānām anutpādāt | pratipakṣatvād bhāvyamānaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ
line.right: kleśānāṃ pratipakṣo bhavati tasmād buddhavacanaṃ | rutānyatvāt na cāsya yathārutam arthas tasmān na yathārutārthānusāreṇedam

line.left: kiṃ darśyati | avataraty evedaṃ svasmin mahāyānasūtre svasya ca śleśasya vinayaḥ saṃdṛśyate | yo mahāyāne bodhisatvānāṃ śleśa uktaḥ |
line.right: hi bodhisatvāḥ | audāryagambhīryalakṣaṇatvāc ca | na dharmatāṃ vilomayaty athaiva hi dharmatā mahābodhiprāpataye tasmān nāsti

line.left: śrāvakayāne na buddhatvaṃ prāptam ity uktam atha mahāyānaṃ katham upāyo yukta ity upāyatvayoge ślokaḥ | audāryād api gāmbhīryāt paripāko
line.right: | deśanā'to dvayasyāsmin sa copāyo niruttare || AMsa_ 1 . 1 3 || anena ślokena kiṃ darśayati | prabhāv audāryadeśanayā satvānāṃ paripāko

line.left: || AMsa_ 1 . 1 3 || anena ślokena kiṃ darśayati | prabhāv audāryadeśanayā satvānāṃ paripāko prabhāv adhimuktito ghaṭanāt | gāmbhīryadeśanayā
line.right: ata etasya dvayasyāsmin mahāyāne deśanā sa copāyo niruttare jñāne tābhyāṃ yathākramaṃ </page><page> satvānāṃ paripācanād ātmanaś ca

line.left: | hetvādibalād dṛḍhodayaḥ pāramārthikacittotpāde sapta ślokāḥ | sūpāsitasaṃbuddhe susaṃbhṛtajñānapuṇyasaṃbhāre | dharmeṣu
line.right: paramatāsya || AMsa_ 4 . 8 || dharmeṣu ca satveṣu ca tatkṛtyeṣūttame ca buddhatve | samacittopāttopalambhāt prāmodyaviśiṣṭatā tasya ||

line.left: | āśayaśuddhir jñeyā kauśalyaṃ tv anyabhūmigatam || AMsa_ 4 . 1 3 || niryāṇaṃ vijñeyaṃ yathāvyavasthānamanasikāreṇa | tatkalpanatājñānād
line.right: ca tasyaiva || AMsa_ 4 . 1 4 || prathamena ślokenopadeśapratipattyadhigamaviśeṣaiḥ pāramārthikatvaṃ cittotpādasya darśayati | sa ca

line.left: yathāvyavasthānabhūmimanasikāreṇa | kathaṃ manasikāreṇa tasya bhūmivyavasthānasya kalpanājñānāt kalpanāmātram etad iti | tasyaiva ca
line.right: | aupamyamāhātmye ṣaḍ ślokāḥ | pṛthivīsama utpādaḥ kalyāṇasuvarṇasaṃnibhaś cānyaḥ | śuklanavacandrasadṛśo vahniprakhyo 'parocchrāyaḥ

line.left: pratyakṣatām eti | caturthena bhāvanāmārgāvasthāyām aśrayaparivartanāt pāramārthikajñānapraveśaṃ darśayati | sadā sarvatra
line.right: yatra tatsamatānugataṃ paratantre svabhāve tadāśrayasya dūra-anupraviṣṭasya doṣasaṃcayasya dauṣṭhulyalakṣaṇasya mahāgadeneva

line.left: astaṃ prayātaṃ bhavati suvipulaiḥ sarvahāniprakāraiḥ | buddhatvaṃ śukladharmapravaraguṇayutā āśrayasyānyathāptis tatprāptir
line.right: viṣayasumahato jñānamārgāt suśuddhāt || AMsa_ 9 . 1 2 || anena vipakṣabījaviyogataḥ pratipakṣasaṃpattiyogataś cāśrayaparivṛttiḥ

line.left: satvaparipācanakarma niṣṭhāgamanakarma dharmadeśanākarma nirmāṇādikṛtyakarma jñānapravṛttikarma
line.right: citrākārajñānakarma jñānāpravṛttikarma vimuktisāmānyajñānaviśeṣakarma cārabhyoktaṃ | seyamanāsrave dhātau niṣprapañcatvād

line.left: sarvapañcārthavṛttau | tatra pratyekaṃ dvādaśaguṇaśatotpattau | manaso 'pi parāvṛttau vibhutvaṃ labhyate param | vibhutvānucare jñāne
line.right: sunirmale || AMsa_ 9 . 4 2 || manasaḥ parāvṛttau vibhutvānucare nirvikalpe suviśuddhe jñāne paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate | yena sahitaṃ sarvaṃ

line.left: 'pi parāvṛttau vibhutvaṃ labhyate param | vibhutvānucare jñāne nirvikalpe sunirmale || AMsa_ 9 . 4 2 || manasaḥ parāvṛttau vibhutvānucare
line.right: suviśuddhe jñāne paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate | yena sahitaṃ sarvaṃ vibhutvajñānaṃ pravartate | sārthodgrahaparāvṛttau vibhutvaṃ

line.left: paramaṃ labhyate yena yathākāmaṃ bhogasaṃdarśanaṃ karoti | avyāghāte sadākālaṃ sarveṣāṃ jñānakarmaṇām || AMsa_ 9 . 44 ||
line.right: sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca sarvakālam avyāghāte paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate | pratiṣṭhāyāḥ parāvṛttau vibhutvaṃ labhyate param |

line.left: sarvam etad yathoditaṃ | akalpabodhisatvānāṃ prāptā bodhir nirūpyate || AMsa_ 9 . 8 1 || kalpanāmātraṃ tv etat sarvam iti paśyatāṃ tasyāpi
line.right: akalpabodhisatvānām anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāvasthāyām arthataḥ prāptaiva bodhir ity ucyate | buddhānām anyonya naikakāryatve

line.left: laukikaṃ jñānaṃ | etāvac ca sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ | saṃkleśavyavadānaparyeṣṭau ślokadvayaṃ | svadhātuto dvayābhāsāḥ sāvidyākleśavṛttayaḥ |
line.right: saṃpravartante dvayadravyavivarjitāḥ || AMsa_ 11 . 3 2 || svadhātuta iti bhāvāṅgād ālayavijñānataḥ | dvayābhāsā iti grāhyagrāhakābhāsāḥ |

line.left: carmakāṇḍavat || AMsa_ 11 . 33 || ālambanaviśeṣāptir iti yo dharmālambanalābhaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ | svadhātusthānayogata iti svadhātur
line.right: tathatā tatra sthānaṃ nāmni sthānāc cetasaḥ | yogata ity abhyāsāt | bhāvanāmārgeṇa ta eva vikalpā advayābhāsā vartante parāvṛttāśrayasya |

line.left: | svadhātusthānayogata iti svadhātur vikalpānāṃ tathatā tatra sthānaṃ nāmni sthānāc cetasaḥ | yogata ity abhyāsāt | bhāvanāmārgeṇa ta eva
line.right: advayābhāsā vartante parāvṛttāśrayasya | carmavat kāṇḍavac ca | yathā hi kharatvāpagamāt tad eva carma mṛdu bhavati | agnisaṃtāpanayā tad

line.left: | agnisaṃtāpanayā tad eva kāṇḍaṃ ṛju bhavati | evaṃ śamathavipaśyanābhāvanābhyāṃ cetaḥprajñāvimuktilābhe parāvṛttāśrayasya ta eva
line.right: na punar dvayābhāsāḥ pravartante ity eva vyavadānaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ | vijñaptimātratāparyeṣṭau dvau ślokau | cittaṃ dvayaprabhāsaṃ

line.left: trividhaś cābhāso 'syeti trividhatrividhābhāsaḥ | tatra trividhābhāsaḥ padābhāso 'rthābhāso dehābhāsaś ca | punas trividhābhāso
line.right: | mano yat kliṣṭaṃ sarvadā | udgrahaḥ pañca vijñānakāyāḥ | vikalpo manovijñānaṃ | tatra prathamatrividhābhāso grāhyalakṣaṇaḥ | dvitīyo

line.left: 'rthābhāso dehābhāsaś ca | punas trividhābhāso manaudgrahavikalpābhāsaḥ | mano yat kliṣṭaṃ sarvadā | udgrahaḥ pañca vijñānakāyāḥ |
line.right: manovijñānaṃ | tatra prathamatrividhābhāso grāhyalakṣaṇaḥ | dvitīyo grāhakalakṣaṇaḥ | ity ayam abhūtaparikalpaḥ paratantrasya

line.left: bhāvāt | bhāvābhāvasamānatā ca tayor bhāvābhāvayor abhinnatvāt | aśāntā cāgantukair upakleśaiḥ śāntā ca prakṛtipariśaddhatvāt |
line.right: ca vikalpāgocaratvāt niṣprapañcatayā | etena trividhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tathatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ kleśavyavadānalakṣaṇam

line.left: | bhāvābhāvasamānatā ca tayor bhāvābhāvayor abhinnatvāt | aśāntā cāgantukair upakleśaiḥ śāntā ca prakṛtipariśaddhatvāt | avikalpā ca
line.right: niṣprapañcatayā | etena trividhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tathatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ kleśavyavadānalakṣaṇam avikalpalakṣaṇaṃ ca | uktaṃ

line.left: | avikalpā ca vikalpāgocaratvāt niṣprapañcatayā | etena trividhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tathatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ kleśavyavadānalakṣaṇam
line.right: ca | uktaṃ trividhaṃ lakṣanāṃ | niṣpandadharmam ālambya yoniśo manasikriyā | cittasya dhātau sthānaṃ ca sadasattārthapaśyanā || AMsa_ 11 . 4

line.left: anāsravo dhātur vimuktiḥ | sa ca sarvatragāśrayaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhagataḥ | caturdhā vaśitā vṛtter manasaś codgrahaś ca ca |
line.right: hi kṣetre jñāne 'tha karmaṇi || AMsa_ 11 . 4 5 || manasaś codgrahasya ca vikalpasya cāvṛtteḥ parāvṛtter ity arthaḥ | caturdhā vaśitā bhavati

line.left: | caturdhā vaśitā vṛtter manasaś codgrahaś ca ca | vikalpasyāvikalpe hi kṣetre jñāne 'tha karmaṇi || AMsa_ 11 . 4 5 || manasaś codgrahasya ca
line.right: cāvṛtteḥ parāvṛtter ity arthaḥ | caturdhā vaśitā bhavati yathākramam avikalpe kṣetre jñānakarmaṇoś ca | acalāditribhūmau ca vaśitā sā

line.left: jñāne 'tha karmaṇi || AMsa_ 11 . 4 5 || manasaś codgrahasya ca vikalpasya cāvṛtteḥ parāvṛtter ity arthaḥ | caturdhā vaśitā bhavati yathākramam
line.right: kṣetre jñānakarmaṇoś ca | acalāditribhūmau ca vaśitā sā caturvidhā | dvidhaikasyāṃ tadanyasyām ekaikā vaśitā matā || AMsa_ 11 . 4 6 || sā ceyam

line.left: tadanyasyām ekaikā vaśitā matā || AMsa_ 11 . 4 6 || sā ceyam acalādibhūmitraye caturdhā vaśitā veditavyā | ekasyām acalāyāṃ bhūmau dvividhā |
line.right: na cānabhisaṃskāranirvikalpatvāt | kṣetre ca buddhakṣetrapariśodhanāt | tadanyasyāṃ bhūmāv ekaikā vaśitā sādhumatyaṃ jñānavaśitā

line.left: ekaikā vaśitā matā || AMsa_ 11 . 4 6 || sā ceyam acalādibhūmitraye caturdhā vaśitā veditavyā | ekasyām acalāyāṃ bhūmau dvividhā | avikalpe na
line.right: | kṣetre ca buddhakṣetrapariśodhanāt | tadanyasyāṃ bhūmāv ekaikā vaśitā sādhumatyaṃ jñānavaśitā pratisaṃvidviśeṣalābhāt |

line.left: mātsaryadānādivipakṣapratipakṣayor doṣaguṇapratisaṃvedanāt | cayānusmaraṇaprītir māhārthyasya ca darśanam | yoge 'bhilāṣo
line.right: taddhṛtyāṃ pratyayāgame || AMsa_ 11 . 6 7 || cayānusmaraṇaprītimanaskāro dānādyupacaye puṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacayasaṃdarśanāt |

line.left: | abhilāṣamanaskāraḥ sa punaś caturvidhaḥ | yogābhilāṣamanaskāraḥ śamathavipaśyanāyogabhāvanābhilāṣāt |
line.right: pāramitāparipūraṇārtham upāyakauśalyābhilāṣāt | dhṛtyabhilāṣamanaskāraḥ pāramitādhipateyadharmārthadhāraṇābhilāṣāt |

line.left: | ārogyahetutvād bhaiṣajyasaṃjñā abhijñāiśvaryahetutvād arthasaṃjñā | tadakṣayahetutvān nirvāṇasaṃjñākṣayanirbhayatārthena |
line.right: ślokaḥ | abhāvabhāvādhyapavādakalpa ekatvanānāsvaviśeṣakalpāḥ | yathārthanāmābhiniveśakalpāḥ jinātmajaiḥ saṃparivarjanīyāḥ ||

line.left: ekatvanānāsvaviśeṣakalpāḥ | yathārthanāmābhiniveśakalpāḥ jinātmajaiḥ saṃparivarjanīyāḥ || AMsa_ 11 . 77 ||
line.right: bodhisatvena parivarjanīyaḥ | abhāvavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | prajñāpāramitāyām iha bodhisatvo bodhisatva eva sann iti |

line.left: | yathārthanāmābhiniveśakalpāḥ jinātmajaiḥ saṃparivarjanīyāḥ || AMsa_ 11 . 77 || daśavidhavikalpo bodhisatvena parivarjanīyaḥ |
line.right: yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | prajñāpāramitāyām iha bodhisatvo bodhisatva eva sann iti | bhāvavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | bodhisatvaṃ na

line.left: bodhisatvena parivarjanīyaḥ | abhāvavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | prajñāpāramitāyām iha bodhisatvo bodhisatva eva sann iti |
line.right: yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | bodhisatvaṃ na samanupaśyatīty evam ādi | adhyāropavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | rūpaṃ śāriputra svabhāvena

line.left: | prajñāpāramitāyām iha bodhisatvo bodhisatva eva sann iti | bhāvavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | bodhisatvaṃ na samanupaśyatīty evam ādi |
line.right: yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | rūpaṃ śāriputra svabhāvena śūnyam iti | apavādavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | na śūnyatayeti | ekatvavikalpo yasya

line.left: | bodhisatvaṃ na samanupaśyatīty evam ādi | adhyāropavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | rūpaṃ śāriputra svabhāvena śūnyam iti |
line.right: yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | na śūnyatayeti | ekatvavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tadrūpam iti | nānātvavikalpo yasya

line.left: | adhyāropavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | rūpaṃ śāriputra svabhāvena śūnyam iti | apavādavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | na śūnyatayeti |
line.right: yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tadrūpam iti | nānātvavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | na cānyatra śūnyatāyā rūpaṃ rūpam eva

line.left: iti | apavādavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | na śūnyatayeti | ekatvavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tadrūpam iti |
line.right: yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | na cānyatra śūnyatāyā rūpaṃ rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpam iti | svalakṣaṇavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha |

line.left: rūpasya śūnyatā na tadrūpam iti | nānātvavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | na cānyatra śūnyatāyā rūpaṃ rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpam iti |
line.right: yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ rūpam iti | viśeṣavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | rūpasya hi notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na

line.left: śūnyatāyā rūpaṃ rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpam iti | svalakṣaṇavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ rūpam iti |
line.right: yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | rūpasya hi notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam iti | yathānāmārthābhiniveśavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha |

line.left: | nāmamātram idaṃ yad idaṃ rūpam iti | viśeṣavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | rūpasya hi notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam iti |
line.right: yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | kṛtrimaṃ nāmety evam ādi | yathārthanāmābhiniveśavikalpaś ca yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | tāni bodhisatvaḥ sarvanāmāni

line.left: hi notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam iti | yathānāmārthābhiniveśavikalpo yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | kṛtrimaṃ nāmety evam ādi |
line.right: ca yasya pratipakṣeṇāha | tāni bodhisatvaḥ sarvanāmāni na samanupaśyat yasamanupaśyan nābhiniviśate yathārthatayetya bhiprāyaḥ | iti

line.left: darśanajñeyānāṃ heyānāṃ kleśānāṃ sarvasaṃkṣayam | jñeyāvaraṇajñānāya hānāya bhavanāyāṃ prayujyate || AMsa_ 1 3 . 5 || śloko gatārthaḥ |
line.right: jñānena sahacāriṇā | anudharmaṃ caraty evaṃ pariśiṣṭāsu bhūmiṣu || AMsa_ 1 3 . 6 || śeṣeṇānudharmacāritvaṃ darśayati |

line.left: jñānena sahacāriṇā | anudharmaṃ caraty evaṃ pariśiṣṭāsu bhūmiṣu || AMsa_ 1 3 . 6 || śeṣeṇānudharmacāritvaṃ darśayati |
line.right: bhūmivyavasthānajñānenāvikalpena </page><page> ca | sahacāriṇety anusaṃbaddhacāriṇā anyonyanairantaryeṇa | etena ślokadvayenānudharmacāritvaṃ

line.left: sahacāriṇā | anudharmaṃ caraty evaṃ pariśiṣṭāsu bhūmiṣu || AMsa_ 1 3 . 6 || śeṣeṇānudharmacāritvaṃ darśayati | vyavasthānāvikalpenāti
line.right: </page><page> ca | sahacāriṇety anusaṃbaddhacāriṇā anyonyanairantaryeṇa | etena ślokadvayenānudharmacāritvaṃ darśitaṃ | pratipattāv

line.left: | na khalu jinasutānāṃ bādhakaṃ duḥkhamugraṃ narakabhavanavāsaiḥ satvahetoḥ kathaṃcit | śamabhavaguṇadoṣapreritā hīnayāne
line.right: bādhakā dhīmatāṃ tu || AMsa_ 1 3 . 1 4 || na khalu narakavāso dhīmatāṃ sarvakālaṃ vimalavipulabodherantarāyaṃ karoti | svahitaparamaśītas

line.left: tu || AMsa_ 1 3 . 1 4 || na khalu narakavāso dhīmatāṃ sarvakālaṃ vimalavipulabodherantarāyaṃ karoti | svahitaparamaśītas tvanyayāne
line.right: paramasukhavihāre 'pyantarāyaṃ karoti || AMsa_ 1 3 . 1 5 || </page><page> anayoḥ ślokayor ekasya dvitīyaḥ sādhakaḥ | ubhau gatārtho |

line.left: | jñeyāviparyāsāc ca | pratipattitrimaṇḍalapariśuddhau ślokaḥ | iti satatam udārayuktavīryo dvayaparipācanaśodhane suyuktaḥ |
line.right: vrajati sa siddhim anuttamāṃ krameṇa || AMsa_ 1 3 . 2 9 || </page><page> iti nirvikalpena dharmanairātmyajñānena pratipattuḥ pratipattavyasya

line.left: dvayaparipācanaśodhane suyuktaḥ | paramavimalanirvikalpabuddhyā vrajati sa siddhim anuttamāṃ krameṇa || AMsa_ 1 3 . 2 9 || </page><page> iti
line.right: dharmanairātmyajñānena pratipattuḥ pratipattavyasya pratipatteś cāvikalpanā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhir veditavyā |

line.left: sa siddhim anuttamāṃ krameṇa || AMsa_ 1 3 . 2 9 || </page><page> iti nirvikalpena dharmanairātmyajñānena pratipattuḥ pratipattavyasya pratipatteś
line.right: trimaṇḍalapariśuddhir veditavyā | dvayaparipācanaśodhaneṣu yukta iti satvānām ātmanaś ca | mahāyānasūtrālaṃkāre pratipattyadhikāras

line.left: etāni hi yathākramaṃ || AMsa_ 1 4 . 2 7 || ity etāny uṣmagatādīni nirvedhabhāgīyāni | dvayagrāhavisaṃyuktaṃ lokottaram anuttaraṃ |
line.right: malāpetaṃ jñānaṃ sa labhate punaḥ || AMsa_ 1 4 . 2 8 || </page><page> ataḥ pareṇa darśanamārgāvasthā | dvayagrāhavisaṃyuktaṃ

line.left: AMsa_ 1 4 . 2 8 || </page><page> ataḥ pareṇa darśanamārgāvasthā | dvayagrāhavisaṃyuktaṃ grāhyagrāhagrāhakagrāhavisaṃyogāt | anuttaraṃ yānānantaryeṇa |
line.right: grāhyagrāhakavikalpavisaṃyogāt | malāpetaṃ darśanajñeyakleśaprahāṇāt | etena virajo vigatamalam ity uktaṃ bhavati |

line.left: <page> ataḥ pareṇa darśanamārgāvasthā | dvayagrāhavisaṃyuktaṃ grāhyagrāhagrāhakagrāhavisaṃyogāt | anuttaraṃ yānānantaryeṇa | nirvikalpaṃ
line.right: | malāpetaṃ darśanajñeyakleśaprahāṇāt | etena virajo vigatamalam ity uktaṃ bhavati | sāsyāśrayaparāvṛttiḥ prathamā bhūmir iṣyate |

line.left: tathābhāvo yathā kalpyate svena lakṣaṇena bhāvaḥ | prakṛtiśūnyatā pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ śūnyatāsvabhāvatvāt | animittapadaṃ jñeyaṃ
line.right: ca saṃkṣayaḥ | abhūtaparikalpaś ca tadapraṇihitasya hi || AMsa_ 1 4 . 3 5 || animittapadaṃ jñeyaṃ vikalpānāṃ ca saṃkṣayaḥ | abhūtaparikalpas

line.left: | animittapadaṃ jñeyaṃ vikalpānāṃ ca saṃkṣayaḥ | abhūtaparikalpaś ca tadapraṇihitasya hi || AMsa_ 1 4 . 3 5 || animittapadaṃ jñeyaṃ
line.right: ca saṃkṣayaḥ | abhūtaparikalpas tadapraṇidhānasya padam ālambanam ity arthaḥ | tena darśanamārgeṇa saha lābhaḥ sadā mataḥ | sarveṣāṃ

line.left: ca niryāṇaṃ dvayasaṃkhyeyasamāptitaḥ | paścimāṃ bhāvanām etya bodhisatvau 'bhiṣiktakaḥ || AMsa_ 1 4 . 44 || vajropamaṃ samādhānaṃ
line.right: etya ca | niṣṭhāśrayaparāvṛttiṃ sarvāvaraṇanirmalāṃ || AMsa_ 1 4 . 4 5 || sarvākārajñatāṃ caiva labhate 'nuttaraṃ padaṃ | yatra sthaḥ

line.left: 'nuttaraṃ padaṃ | yatra sthaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ hitāya pratipadyate || AMsa_ 1 4 . 4 6 || ebhir bhāvanāmārgaḥ paridīpitaḥ | dvividhaṃ jñānaṃ |
line.right: ca yenātmano buddhadharmāṇ viśodhayati | yathāvyavasthānaṃ ca lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ laukikaṃ yena satvān paripācayati |

line.left: yena satvān paripācayati | asaṃkhyeyadvayasya samāptau paścimāṃ bhāvanām āgamyāvasānagatām abhiṣikto vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ labhate |
line.right: vajropamaḥ | tato niṣṭhāgatām āśrayaparāvṛttiṃ labhate sarvakleśajñeyāvaraṇanirmalāṃ | sarvākārajñatāṃ cānuttarapadaṃ yatrastho

line.left: | utpannakuśalamūlasya dhvaṃsanāt | buddhatvasaṃpatprāptivibandhanāc ca | na karmiṇaḥ karma na karmaṇaḥ kriyāṃ
line.right: samudīkṣate tridhā | tato 'sya tatkarma viśuddhipāragaṃ bhavaty anantaṃ tadupāyasaṃgrahāt || AMsa_ 1 5 . 5 || anena ślokena caturthena

line.left: mahābodhiprāptitaś ca | iti sakalaparārthādhikārāt ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ | bhogeṣu cānabhiratis tīvrā gurutādvaye akhedaś ca | yogaś ca
line.right: samas tam idam uttamaṃ yānaṃ || AMsa_ 1 6 . 5 || iti caturthaḥ | dānena bodhisatvasya bhogeṣv abhiratir nirapekṣatvāt | śīlasamādānena

line.left: bodhisatvaśikṣāsu tīvrā gurutā | kṣāntyā vīryeṇa cākhedo dvaye yathākramaṃ duḥkhe ca satvāsatvakṛte kuśalaprayoge ca | dhyānaprajñāyāṃ
line.right: </page><page> yogaḥ śamathavipaśyanāsaṃgṛhītaḥ | etāvac ca samastamahāyānasaṃgrahādhikārāt ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ | viṣayeṣv asaktimārgas

line.left: api śikṣāsv ekā vīryapāramitā veditavyā | sarvāsāṃ vīryasahāyatvāt | lakṣaṇavibhāge ślokāḥ ṣaṭ | dānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca
line.right: | sarvecchāparipūrakam api satvavipācakaṃ tredhā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 8 || bodhisatvānāṃ dānaṃ caturvidhalakṣaṇaṃ | vipakṣahīnaṃ tātparyasya

line.left: api satvavipācakaṃ tredhā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 8 || bodhisatvānāṃ dānaṃ caturvidhalakṣaṇaṃ | vipakṣahīnaṃ tātparyasya prahīṇatvāt |
line.right: dharmanairātmyaprativedhayogāt sarvecchāparipūrakaṃ yo yad icchati tasmai tasya dānāt | satvaparipācakaṃ tredhā dānena satvān

line.left: tasya dānāt | satvaparipācakaṃ tredhā dānena satvān saṃgṛhya triṣu yāneṣu yathābhavyaniyojanāt | śīlaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca
line.right: | sarvecchāparipūrakam api satvavipācakaṃ tredhā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 9 || kṣāntirvipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena | sarvecchāparipūrā

line.left: jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena | sarvecchāparipūrakam api satvavipācakaṃ tredhā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 9 || kṣāntirvipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca
line.right: | sarvecchāparipūrā api satvavipācikā tredhā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 1 0 || </page><page> vīryaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nivikalpena | sarvecchāparipūrakam

line.left: jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena | sarvecchāparipūrā api satvavipācikā tredhā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 1 0 || </page><page> vīryaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca
line.right: | sarvecchāparipūrakam api satvāvipācakaṃ tredhā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 11 || dhyānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena |

line.left: jñānena gataṃ ca nivikalpena | sarvecchāparipūrakam api satvāvipācakaṃ tredhā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 11 || dhyānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca
line.right: | sarvecchāparipūrakam api satvavipācakaṃ tredhā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 1 2 || prajñā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena | sarvecchāparipūrā

line.left: jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena | sarvecchāparipūrakam api satvavipācakaṃ tredhā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 1 2 || prajñā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca
line.right: | sarvecchāparipūrā api satvavipācikā tredhā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 1 3 || yathā dānalakṣaṇaṃ caturvidham evaṃ śīlādīnāṃ veditavyaṃ | eṣāṃ tu vipakṣā

line.left: āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ | upāyasaṃniśritā bhāvanā tryākārā |
line.right: jñānena trimaṇḍalapariśuddhipratyavekṣaṇatām upādāya | tathā hi sa upāyaḥ sarvamanasikārāṇām abhiniṣpattaye | vibhutvasaṃniśritā

line.left: tadvipakṣalābhānuśayāsamudghātāt | vikṣepasaktiś ca | sa punar vikṣepo dvividhaḥ | manasikāravikṣepaś ca hīnayānaspṛhaṇāt |
line.right: ca dāyakapratigrāhakadānavikalpanāt | ataḥ saptavidhasaktimuktatvāt saptakṛtvo dānasyāsaktatvam uktaṃ | na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca

line.left: | vikṣepasaktiś ca | sa punar vikṣepo dvividhaḥ | manasikāravikṣepaś ca hīnayānaspṛhaṇāt | vikalpavikṣepaś ca
line.right: | ataḥ saptavidhasaktimuktatvāt saptakṛtvo dānasyāsaktatvam uktaṃ | na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ saktam eva na ca śīlaṃ | na ca saktaṃ

line.left: veditavyā | atra tu viśeṣabhogasaktiparivartena dauḥśīlyādyāsaktir veditavyā vipakṣasaktis tadvipakṣānuśayāsamudghātanāt |
line.right: ca yathāyogaṃ trimaṇḍalaparikalpanāt | guṇavibhāge trayoviṃśatiḥ ślokāḥ | tyaktaṃ buddhasutaiḥ svajīvitam api prāpyārthinaṃ sarvadā

line.left: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pudgaladharmanairātmyaṃ | jñeyaṃ ca yat sarvathety anantasvasaṃketādilakṣaṇabhedabhinnaṃ yad ajñeyaṃ | dānādīnāṃ
line.right: nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe 'pi tadakṣayāt | jñānasya punaḥ satvaparigraheṇa karuṇayā satvānām aparityāgāt | eṣāṃ punaḥ ṣaṇāṃ ślokānāṃ

line.left: | dharmadānasya mahāyānaṃ | nimittaṃ karuṇā | pariṇāmanā tena mahābodhiphalaprārthanā | hetuḥ pūrvadānapāramitābhyāsavāsanā | jñānaṃ
line.right: yena trimaṇḍalapariśuddhaṃ dānaṃ dadāti dātṛdeyapratigrāhakāvikalpanāt | kṣetraṃ pañcavidhaṃ | arthī duḥkhito niḥpratisaraṇo

line.left: tena mahābodhiphalaprārthanā | hetuḥ pūrvadānapāramitābhyāsavāsanā | jñānaṃ nirvikalpaṃ yena trimaṇḍalapariśuddhaṃ dānaṃ dadāti
line.right: | kṣetraṃ pañcavidhaṃ | arthī duḥkhito niḥpratisaraṇo duścaritacārī guṇavāṃś ca | caturṇām uttaraṃ kṣetraṃ paraṃ | tadabhāve pañcamaṃ |

line.left: saṃgrahavastūnām ekāyanamārgatvaṃ darśayati | anyamārgābhāvāt | iti satatam asaktabhogabuddhiḥ śamayamanodyamapāragaḥ sthitātmā |
line.right: bhavati sa satvagaṇasya saṃgṛhītā || AMsa_ 1 6 . 7 9 || etena yathoktāsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitasya bodhisatvasya saṃgrahavastuprayoga

line.left: buddhāḥ | vastu cīvarādayaḥ | nimittaṃ pragāḍhaprasādasahagataṃ cittaṃ | pariṇāmanā utpādaḥ syād iti pūrvapraṇidhānaṃ | jñānaṃ
line.right: pūjakapūjyapūjānupalambhataḥ | kṣetram aprameyāḥ satvāḥ | tatparipācanāya tais tatprayojatāt teṣu tadropaṇataḥ | niśraya upadhiśritaṃ

line.left: parair iti bāhyā | lābhasatkārato audārikī | pratipattitaḥ sūkṣmā | parīttā hīnā mahatī praṇītā | punaḥ samānā hīnā nirmānā praṇītā
line.right: | kālāntaraprayojyā dūre | tatkālaprayojyāntike | punar vicchinnāyāṃ gatau dūre | samanantarāyām antike | punar yāṃ pūjām āyatyāṃ

line.left: | atṛptavipulam uditopakaranirlepakalyāṇāśayaiś ca ye pāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ | vibhutvato gaganagañjādisamādhibhiḥ |
line.right: | sarvamahābodhisatvaikakāryatvapraveśataś ca miśropamiśrakāryatvāt | kalyāṇamitrasevāvibhāge sapta ślokāḥ | tatrārdhapañcamaiḥ

line.left: sarvaikakāryatvaniveśataś ca || AMsa_ 1 7 . 1 6 || iti pūrvavat | apramāṇavibhāge dvādaśa ślokāḥ | brāhmā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatāś ca
line.right: | trividhālambanavṛttāḥ satvānāṃ pācakā dhīre || AMsa_ 1 7 . 1 7 || brāhmyā vihārāś catvāry apramāṇāni | maitrī karuṇā muditopekṣā ca | te punar

line.left: teṣāṃ satvānāṃ niḥkleśatopasaṃhārākārā | dharmālambanās taddeśite dharme | yatra te vihārā deśitāḥ | anālambanās tattathatāyāṃ | te hy
line.right: anālambanā ivety anālambanāḥ | api khalu | tasyāś ca tathatārthatvāt kṣāntilābhād viśuddhitaḥ | karmadvayād anālambā maitrī kleśakṣayād

line.left: 'py aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmāv anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāt | maitrādibhāvanāgrā svacittato dharmato 'dhimokṣāc ca | āśayato 'pi vibhutvād
line.right: aikyataś cāpi || AMsa_ 1 7 . 6 5 || iti | pūrvanirdeśānusāreṇārtho 'nugantavyaḥ | iti bhagavati jātasuprasādo
